https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pmHAw2vTYN3t5DezIAvIiZ7yJuZ.jpg A good-natured man has an unexpected deadly confrontation. Instincts kick in to clean up the mess caused in the name of self-defense but does one really get away free after killing someone? Cross the Line
